title: Polska
creator_credit: David Bradbury, AFFC and Film Australia
brief_description: A documentary on contemporary life in and history of Poland. Shows Lech Walensa speaking in public, and has interviews with Poles about daily life in Poland. Recorded in English but contains subtitles in English for spoken Polish. Filmed in colour with some Black & White sequences.
